name: Klee
title: "Fleeing Sunlight" Klee
desc: Every card you draw may bring an "explosive surprise."

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Klee to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Jumpy Dumpty
skills.desc: Deals 3 <span style="color:#FF9999FF">Pyro DMG. This character gains <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Explosive Spark.

skills.name: Sparks 'n' Splash
skills.desc: Deals 3 <span style="color:#FF9999FF">Pyro DMG, creates 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Sparks 'n' Splash at the opponent's play area.
